author: Jennifer Rubin
title: We must hold politicians responsible for deaths they could have prevented
description: Delinquent politicians such as Florida's Ron DeSantis should be held accountable.
content: On Tuesday, DeSantis again refused to order a statewide stay-at-home order, although his state is sixth in the country in the number of infections. He wants the federal government to tell him what to do. (If any of those task force folks tell me that we shoul… [+3608 chars]
